mkplanetlc module¶

Make a planet signal

usage:

mkplanetlc.py [-h|–help] [-m|–plot] -s tframe -f nframe -p planet.json -o lc.fits

options:

-h –help show this help message and exit -m –plot plot light curve -s tframe exposure [sec] of a frame -f nframe number of the frames -p planet.json planet parameters -o lc.fits output lightcurve fits

mkpixcube module

Next topic

mkpsf module
